## Viewport.registerElement() method

Creates an empty entry for an element with the given ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
registerElement(id: string, doNotRecalculateBounds?: boolean): ViewportElement<T["E"]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string |  |
|  doNotRecalculateBounds | boolean | If true, the viewport's bounds won't be recalculated after the element has been registered. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ViewportElement](./core.viewportelement)<!-- -->&lt;T\["E"\]&gt;
